thread.section_title: Business & Financial News, U.S & International Breaking News | Reuters
thread.title: Marriott Vacations to buy ILG in $4.7 billion deal

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Marriott Vacations to buy ILG in $4.7 billion deal
text:
April 30, 2018 / 11:18 AM / Updated 18 minutes ago Marriott Vacations to buy ILG in $4.7 billion deal Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corp ( VAC.N ) said on Monday it would buy fellow vacation timeshare company ILG Inc ( ILG.O ) in a cash and stock deal worth about $4.7 billion.
ILG shareholders will receive $14.75 in cash and 0.165 shares of Marriott Vacations for each share, Marriott Vacations said. [nPn9tDxpGa]
Reuters reported earlier this month that the two companies were in advanced talks over a deal. [nL8N1RQ66B] Reporting by Arunima Banerjee in Bengaluru; Editing by Saumyadeb Chakrabarty
